entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to zero this evening then steady. POP 60%

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain showers or periods of freezing rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
